rules_text:
As Constellation Nullifier enters or is turned face up, choose a nonland card name.
Change the text of cards that aren’t on the battlefield, spells, and permanents that entered the battlefield this turn with the chosen name by removing all the text in its text box.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/OoNX9y

!rework only affect permanents that entered this turn [DONE]
